Banner.Description: I'm a software engineer with a degree in computer engineering. Passionate about both full-stack development and cloud computing, I find joy in crafting comprehensive solutions that seamlessly integrate frontend and backend technologies while harnessing the power of cloud services. I enjoy creating websites with clean, reusable code to make them efficient and scalable. Beyond just coding, I believe in using technology to make a positive impact, aiming to create solutions that benefit the world.

About.Title: About me
Paragraphs: In my two years as a software engineer, I've honed my skills in Angular, .NET Core, and Azure services. Leveraging Azure services has not only made deployment seamless but also optimized storage solutions, enhancing the overall performance and reliability of the applications I've worked on.

Throughout my experience, I've built APIs, stored procedures, and dynamic frontend webpages. I've also spearheaded automation testing for APIs, developing a robust framework for effortless testing automation within the team.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):

Jobs.Title: Tech Consultant FTE
Description: Participated in refactoring majority of a project's codebase within 2 weeks, increasing the code quality rating by over 90% and ensuring code reusability.
Developed numerous end-to-end APIs single-handedly using .NET Core and Azure services, incorporating best practices to ensure flexible and scalable code.
Improved the automation framework for API testing, allowing the framework to run an average of 10 test cases at once as opposed to only a single test case at a time.
Chosen as the Development Lead for a batch of interns at Microsoft, guiding them to build a 'Warehouse Management System'.

Jobs.Title: Tech Consultant Intern
Description: Developed a learning portal for Microsoft employees using .NET Core, Vue.JS, and Azure Services.
Utilized Azure services like Azure Active Directory for Multi-Factor Authentication and Azure App Service for hosting the website, with room for future scalability.

Jobs.Title: Python Developer Intern
Description: Automated the diagnosis and analysis of ECG (electrocardiogram) paper records to predict heart-related problems using computer vision and deep learning in Python.

Created multiple custom algorithms in the pre-processing stage to successfully extract ECG signals from the background, ensuring low noise and signal continuity, thus increasing the model accuracy from 82% to 94.4%.

Jobs.Title: Software Developer Intern
Description: Developed new automation scripts for the company’s application in Java using the Selenium framework.
Increased performance by 50% in the existing scripts by optimizing them using data structures.

Jobs.Title: Web Developer Intern
Description: Interned as a full-stack developer at 'Suvigya - A Teaching Assistant', contributing to the development of a student-teacher interactive website using Django.
Spearheaded the creation of the authentication module utilizing Django's authentication system, ensuring secure user access and management.
Implemented notification functionalities for teachers and students, leveraging Django signals structured as event emitters for efficient communication within the platform.

Jobs.Title: Flask Developer Intern
Description: Developed a GRE website utilizing Flask framework, featuring an authentication system for user access control.
Implemented interactive features allowing students to learn new words from uploaded flashcards, as well as take mock quizzes to enhance their GRE preparation experience.

Projects.Title: Book My Turf
Projects.Description: This is an app tailored for booking sports turfs for football, cricket, and tennis. Users have the option to log in either as a regular user or as a turf owner. Turf owners are empowered to add new turf listings to the app, while users can conveniently book available turf slots for their preferred sports activities.

Projects.Title: VisuallyPaired
Projects.Description: A mobile app designed for individuals with visual impairments, enabling them to perform calculations, send messages, make calls, identify currency, and manage their Twitter accounts. It features Alan AI for seamless speech-to-text and text-to-speech conversion, facilitating effortless interaction with users.

Projects.Title: SkillGrader
Projects.Description: The educational platform facilitates university teachers in uploading lecture recordings, tests, and grading student submissions. Students can access the recordings, prepare for tests, and submit their assignments, earning credits based on their grades to fulfill course completion requirements.

Projects.Title: Caption Generator
Projects.Description: The website enables users to upload pictures and automatically generates captions using various NLP techniques, including tokenization, stop words removal, and next word prediction.

Projects.Title: QTalk
Projects.Description: The social chat app enables users to communicate using various media, with a child-lock feature to prevent sharing inappropriate content and discourage offensive language. Additionally, it offers advanced features such as a fake news detector and text extraction from images.

Projects.Title: StudySmart GRE
Projects.Description: A GRE website which offers flashcards and quizzes to help students improve their verbal and math skills. It provides customized study materials to prepare for the exam effectively.

Projects.Title: Blogify Hub
Projects.Description: A blog platform where users can authenticate, create their own blogs, and explore content written by others. Users have the flexibility to include pictures, emojis, and text in their blog posts.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: Feel free to reach out by clicking the button below to send me a message. Whether you have inquiries, job opportunities, or just want to say hello, I'm always eager to hear from you. Let's start a conversation!
